name: Alien Chase for Game Boy
description:
Save Earth from an evil alien horde in an oldschool way with this [unlicensed] Game Boy® game!

Alien Chase has 3 playable levels, each one with a different gameplay.

After downloading  this ROM file (Alien Chase.gb), you'll need a Game Boy® emulator (if you don't know where to find, see install instructions when downloading it).

This is my entry to 2017 version of Github's Game Off.

If you want to see source code of this game, please visit my repository at GitHub: https://github.com/henriquebg/gameoff2017
